summary:
This mod adds The Legendary Soldier into Skyrim, totally voiced.
<br />From greetings to data technology - he'll sure have something to say.
<br />
<br />
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds The Legendary Soldier into Skyrim, totally voiced. He'll be in the most cliche place in Skyrim - [u][i][b]Sleeping Giant Inn[/b][/i][/u].
From greetings to data technology - he'll sure have something to say.
It also adds Liquid Snake in Sovngarde, as a NPC. If you already completed the main quest, you can use [i][u]COC Sovngarde01[/u][/i] to get there and meet him.
If you want a bandana for Snake, make sure you have [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20900/?][u][i][b]BANDANAS OF SKYRIM[/b][/i][/u][/url] installed (you'll have to craft the bandana and give to him)


Inspired by the "Snake follower" mod by Doc117
Voice clips by:
  [i]David Hayter
  Cam Clarke[/i]
[u][i][b]Metal Gear Solid™ is property of Konami.[/b][/i][/u]


This mod is a work of love and apreciation for the Metal Gear Solid™ franchise, with no intention of violation or insult the original work.
The mod author does not gain any profit from anywhere or anyone - and if any is ever gain - shall go to Konami.
Support the mod by playing the original Metal Gear Solid™ from 1998
author: HNQ
